posts.title: 2-In-1 Laser Tape Measure
posts.content: Ensure your next project is done right from the start by measuring everything precisely using this 2-in-1 laser tape measure. It features a simple one-handed operation and comes with both a standard 16 foot tape measure in addition to a 50 foot laser tape.

posts.title: Ice Mold Shot Glasses
posts.content: These Ice Mold Shot Glasses are the perfect way to make sure that your liquor never goes warm and also makes sure nobody cradles their drink all night long – if you don’t down your shot quick enough it’ll melt away and spill over the negligent Debbie Downer.

posts.title: Extreme Hooded Waterproof Blanket
posts.content: Stay dry and toasty by seeking refuge in this extreme hooded waterproof blanket. This 100% waterproof and windproof blanket is large enough to accommodate two people and comes lined with soft fleece on the inside to provide extra warmth.

posts.title: Beer Holster
posts.content: Easily store your beer on your hip while your hands are busy barbequing, lifting weights, boxing, and doing other manly activities that tie up the use of both your hands. Or have stand offs with other beer slingers to see who has the quickest draw time.

posts.title: The Swiss Army Knife Book
posts.content: Learn how to survive in the wild with nothing more than your trusty pocket knife by reading The Swiss Army Knife book. This informative read comes filled with everything you’ll need to make the most out of your handy and versatile knife.

posts.title: Flashlight Shoes
posts.content: Conquer the night as you trek through the unknown wilderness with the flashlight shoes leading the way. Each flashlight comes equipped with an ultra bright white LED for illuminating the darkest environments and two smaller red LEDs for going into stealth mode.

posts.title: Mermaid Tail Glass Cup
posts.content: There’s something fishy about the shape of the mermaid tail glass cups – and we like it because it still gets us drunk! Each mermaid shaped shot glass holds about 100ml in the intricately designed mermaid tail resting within the borosilicate glass cup.

posts.title: Spooky Animated Hand Pillow
posts.content: Create the illusion there are spirits roaming inside your home by setting out this spooky animated hand pillow on your couch. A motion activated sensor triggers an eerie skeleton-like hand to suddenly appear and push out against the stretchable fabric.

posts.title: Modular Indoor/Outdoor Furniture
posts.content: Change your patio’s entire look and feel on a whim by making this modular indoor/outdoor furniture part of your decor. Available in either 4 or 6 piece modules, each piece in the set can be rearranged to your liking – making it perfect for any social gathering.

posts.title: Expert Level Coloring Book
posts.content: Put your artistic skills to the test by taking on the monumental task of completing the expert level coloring book. Each page comes illustrated with incredibly beautiful and intricate patterns designed to challenge you like never before.

posts.title: Poo-Pourri Master Crapsman Gift Set
posts.content: Keep bad odors to a minimum by giving the stinker in your home the Poo-Pouri Master Crapsman gift set. Styled like a rugged little tool box, the set comes with two 2-ounce spray cans of air-fresheners – appropriately named “Trap-A-Crap” and “Royal Flush”.

posts.title: How To Be Interesting Book
posts.content: Face it – you have the personality of a rock. If you want to leave your mark – and not just a blemish – on people you need to stand out. This uniquely inspirational how-to combines fresh and pithy lessons with deceptively simple diagrams and charts.
